name: Yorenspire - The Silent Kingdom
description:
Welcome to the Spire of Yore or how the younger generations calls it: The Yorenspire.

A place where the Dreams Comes True and Adventure Begins...

In one Sentence: "Your Normal 3D RPG Adventure."

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made it in two weeks for the Unexpected Jam. So don´t expect a 40+ gameplay RPG  but do expect BOSS FIGHTS.
